title: Riot screwed me over bigtime.
body:
I have spent over $1000 on my account (150+skins)that i have had since season 2 and it has been permanent banned by Riot when I have done nothing wrong.
I played 2 games with very toxic pre made teams that flame and troll and each time they all gang up and report me and i get banned for nothing.

I WANT MY ACCOUNT BACK.

replies.body:
>Platinum Hoe: im done muting u all gl i dont feel like getting banned 

https://media.giphy.com/media/kD9sGTXNlvqSc/giphy.gif

I dont vote in polls.

First off I will say that report calling is considered harassment ad it only takes one repirt to flag a game. Now that that is out of the way:

You are an increadibly negative influence on your games. You aren't an over the top rager or feeder or anything like that, but once toxicity is introduced in your game you perpetuate it, making it worse.

In order to be banned for this you almost surely went up all of the tiers, which are a 10 game chat ban, a 25 game chat ban, a 14 day suspension, and then a permaban. Anything that can get you a chat restrict can get you permabanned eventually.

Also, how much you spent is not considered when punishing an account.
Lol I was not negative they started feeding,flaming and being toxic and i was doing nothing but defending myself and telling them how it is. Im sure none of them got banned.

First, muting them is an actual solution of defending, not talking crap back & made yourself nothing different to them.

Second, judging from your permaban status, you must have been this toxic more than just those two games. That last punishment you had was already considered your 2nd chance, and you still blew it.

How do you know who i muted and who i didn't? the ban system is flawed when your team flames/trolls for a 40-50 min game and wont surrender of course i'm going to have something to say to them. i really don't care about the previous bans this one is bs.

And remind me again how is your ranting would solve the case in any way? I get it, we all have bad games with teammates who we can consider as _"trolls & dumbasses"_, all you can do is just mute & report the players, or even trying to record the match & screenshot the chat logs & send to Riot Support personally. Your ranting only satisfied the trollers & do even more bad stuff just to see you suffer.

And like I said, I still don't get why you would call the ban system "flawed" when you already got punished in the past while I myself have a hard time getting myself chat restricted at least once.
You're irrelevant and probably have only played this game a year max. i have played since the start of s2 and know much more than you. go be a white knight somewhere else thanks.

Ok, what's with the sudden AD Hominem in your comment? What does my game length experience have anything to do with punishment tiers? Sounds to me that you got tired of reading arguments which doesn't agree with you, and will say anything to get off topic.

And btw, S2 was when punishment tiers doesn't mean shit at all until it was improved during S4 if I remembered correctly.

> but defending myself and telling them how it is

you are in a restaurant, someone stands up and yells at you that you should die of cancer otherwise you should kill yourself. In this moment you stand up for yourself (DEFENDING) and tell him he can fuck himself and go back in the trash can he belongs.

The manager of the restaurant will kick you both out since the rest of the customers want a nice atmosphere. And the Manager won't be interested who started since you both were fucking the situation up. Do that constantly and you go on the blacklist (perma ban) for that restaurant.

We are talking about a business here, this is not kindergarten and Nobody wants to see you spreading a even worse atmosphere. 

YOU SAID:

> Platinum Hoe: im done muting u all gl i dont feel like getting banned rn

and you didn't do it. Your fault. Just because you NEED the hate so deep you couldn't ignore it. I Hope it helped.

Again you cant tell who i did and didn't mute can you? there are toxic players on both teams that you have to deal with in most games that will try to taunt you. In both of the games i was doing fine the team would feed then continue to troll and refuse to surrender even if asked in a decent way.

> Platinum Hoe: im done muting u **all **gl i dont feel like getting banned rn

> Platinum Hoe: im done muting u **all **gl 

> Platinum Hoe: muting u** all **

> Platinum Hoe: **all **

You said ALL...

And anyway, you didn't mute the people who triggerd you. But do I care if you muted anyone? No.

Btw. why do you ignore my restaurant theory?

You are slow, I was talking to the other team because they were also toxic players trying to trigger me that i had to mute. Also I was asking my team to surrender in a decent way so your restaurant theory is trash. Bye.

Bye, see you on rift. ... Oh wait no, we wont D: 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Its funny because if i wanted to i could just make a new account in 2 mins and play and Riot does nothing to prevent that. Riot doesn't care about the community.  I could have just left these games and been fine.

There's no such rule of making more than 1 accounts not being allowed, so go ahead. 

And if you stayed & browsed this website longer, tons of toxic & feeding players were indeed punished since there were threads of "wanting a 2nd chance" created by the trolls/ragers/feeders themselves.
I feel like half the people on these forums are more toxic than me. I have played this game a very long time and Riot can't even take 2 mins to reply to a post  .
